# Problem 2

## importing data and cleaning up
```{r}
participant = read_csv("data/participant.csv", skip = 4) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

accelerometer = read_csv("data/accelerometer.csv",) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = min1:min1440,
    names_to = "time_elsaped",
    values_to = "mims",
    names_prefix = "min"
  )

study = left_join(participant, accelerometer, by = "seqn")

```
